hero.label: About Battle Royale
hero.description: Building the professional gymnastics league that should have existed decades ago.

p1.text: Gymnastics is one of the most-watched sports during the Olympics. Paris 2024 drew
p1.suffix: for women's qualification alone—making it the most-watched Olympic event. Yet outside of the Games, there's nothing.

paragraphs.p2: No professional league. No year-round competition. No team culture. No athlete income pipeline. No way for the millions of gymnastics fans to engage with the sport they love.

p4.text: We're building a professional, repeatable competition series designed for spectators first.
p4.highlight: Mixed teams. Normalized scoring. Real cash prizes.
p4.suffix: A format that casual viewers can follow and hardcore fans can obsess over.

description.text: Starting November 2026 in Ontario/Quebec, Canada. Our goal is to scale to

massiveDemand.title: Massive Demand
massiveDemand.description: 41.5M Olympic viewers prove the audience exists. Social media has created thousands of visible elite athletes with existing followings.

noSupply.title: No Supply
noSupply.description: There's no professional league despite massive demand. Consumers are trained to watch niche sports (UFC, CrossFit, Ninja Warrior).

weHaveDistribution.title: We Have Distribution
weHaveDistribution.description: Gym Art Meets software reaches tens of thousands of gymnasts, parents, and coaches. We own the entire competition stack.

provenTechnology.title: Proven Technology
provenTechnology.description: Our platform is stress-tested across International Gymnix and all major Canadian competitions. We can iterate faster than anyone.

description.suffix: the company behind Gym Art Meets—an end-to-end platform for gymnastics competition management including registration, scheduling, scoring, and media.

items.text: to the gymnastics market through existing platform
that we can modify without third-party dependencies
with federations, clubs, and elite athletes

contact.description: Questions about Battle Royale? Want to partner with us? We'd love to hear from you.
